title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2024 that focus on evaluating large language models (LLMs). These articles cover various aspects of LLM evaluation, including performance metrics, ethical considerations, and practical applications
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** by Jacob Devlin et al
**"Language Models are Few-Shot Learners"** by Tom B. Brown et al
**"Evaluating Large Language Models Trained on Code"** by Mark Chen et al
**"Measuring Massive Multitask Language Understanding"** by Dan Hendrycks et al
**"Beyond Accuracy: Behavioral Testing of NLP Models with CheckList"** by Marco Tulio Ribeiro et al
**"The GEM Benchmark: Natural Language Generation, its Evaluation and Metrics"** by Sebastian Gehrmann et al
**"On the Dangers of Stochastic Parrots: Can Language Models Be Too Big?"** by Emily Bender et al
Measuring How Models Mimic Human Falsehoods"** by Stephanie Lin et al
**"Evaluating the Text-to-Text Transfer Transformer"** by Colin Raffel et al
**"Ethical and Social Risks of Harm from Language Models"** by Irene Solaiman et al
**"Dynabench: Rethinking Benchmarking in NLP"** by Douwe Kiela et al
**"Evaluating the Robustness of Language Models to Input Perturbations"** by Eric Wallace et al
**"The Power of Scale for Parameter-Efficient Prompt Tuning"** by Brian Lester et al
**"Language (Technology) is Power: A Critical Survey of 'Bias' in NLP"** by Su Lin Blodgett et al
**"Evaluating the Performance of Large Language Models on Legal Text"** by Dan Hendrycks et al
**"The State of AI Ethics Report"** by The Montreal AI Ethics Institute
**"Evaluating the Generalization of Large Language Models to Non-English Languages"** by Xinyi Wang et al
**"The Cost of Training NLP Models: A Concise Overview"** by Emma Strubell et al
**"The Benchmarking Crisis: How NLP Models Exceed Human Performance on GLUE, but Still Lack Generalization"** by Samuel R
**"Evaluating the Fairness of Large Language Models"** by Aylin Caliskan et al
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of LLM evaluation, covering both technical and ethical dimensions
